bosses

Class Boss

  • java.lang.Object
    • bosses.Boss_Template
      • bosses.Boss

  • public class Boss
extends Boss_Template
    A Boss is made up of one or more boss_TemplateSegment. The first boss_TemplateSegment is the "head" of the Boss. The last boss_TemplateSegment is the "tail" of the Boss. As the Boss moves, it adds one cell to the head and then removes one from the tail. If the Boss eats a piece of food, the head adds one cell but the tail will not shrink.
